entity_name: Thomas N. Downing, Henry B. Gonzalez, Louis Stokes, Budget Officer

The role of the named entity as the sender implies their involvement in the administrative or oversight functions related to HSCA staff payroll, but the specific nature and extent of their involvement cannot be determined from these documents alone.
